messages.content:
Great news to all our Solly friends. End of Season begins 2 July 2011 across India*. Get set for the most exciting offers !

Offer details:

Buy 1 & Get 20% off

Buy 2 & Get 30% off

Hungry to get more...

Buy 3 & Get 40% off

The offer is valid on Menswear, Womenswear, Kidswear and Accessories . So what are you waiting for ? Ransack the stores now.

Offer valid only until stocks last.

Terms and conditions:
*Only available at exclusive showrooms
* Not Valid for stores in Kerala

Have a great time shopping !

Team Allen Solly.

Hello,

We are doing a short survey to understand you better.Click on the link http://bit.ly/iMrUhY and get going.

And guess what, FIRST 200 valid respondents will get Allen Solly discount vouchers worth Rs. 500. So hurry !

 If you are one of the few lucky people, within 4-5 days of closing the survey you will get the discount code on your mobile phones. 

 
Request you to fill the survey with all your earnestness.

Look forward to your support in this endeavor.

Regards,

Team Allen Solly.
